title: Public Procurement Award Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of awards in public procurement processes.

terms.label: Single-supplier Award
terms.definition: An award made to a single supplier for the contract or lot in question.

terms.label: Multiple-supplier Award
terms.definition: An award made to more than one supplier, such as under a framework agreement or multiple-award contract.

terms.label: Lot-level Award
terms.definition: An award that covers a specific lot or subset of the procurement, rather than the entire procedure or framework.

terms.label: Variation or Amendment
terms.definition: A modification to an existing award or contract that changes scope, value, or other material terms, treated as an award event for transparency purposes.

terms.label: Other Award Type
terms.definition: An award type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
